articles.title: NHS to pilot 'game-changing' blood test that could detect 50 types of cancer - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Charities say move could 'save lives on a vast scale' by detecting potentially lethal disease years before symptoms emerge
articles.content:
A "game-changing" blood test that could detect more than 50 types of cancer is to be introduced by the NHS, the head of the health service has said.
Charities said the move could "save lives on a va… [+1694 chars]

articles.title: Type 2 diabetes warning - four fruits that could be raising your blood sugar levels - Express
articles.description: TYPE 2 diabetes management could be described as a boxing match against high blood sugar levels. To help you land a decisive blow against high blood sugar levels, certain dietary modifications are needed. It may come as a surprise to hear that cutting back on…
